啱字的基本解释

啱
yán
方言，合；合适：呢种款式啱心水（这种款式合她的心意）。我讲两句，唔知啱唔啱（我说两句，不知道合适不合适）。
方言，对；行；可以：你讲得啱（你说得对）。啱啦（行，可以）。
方言，恰巧；刚好：佢啱撞到个老友（他恰巧碰到一个老朋友）。
才；刚：啱食完饭（刚吃完饭）。
方言；合得来：佢同啲同学好啱（他和同学们很合得来）。见《简明香港方言词典》。

啱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ngām］
韩文吏读字。

Basic explanation of words
Croak
yán
Dialect, suitable; suitable: this style is very popular (this style suits her heart). Let me say a few words, don’t know, don’t know, don’t know (I don’t know if it’s appropriate or inappropriate).
Dialect, yes; OK; OK: you speak well (you are right). Wow! (Okay, okay).
Dialect, coincidentally; just right: Qu Qiao bumped into an old friend (he happened to run into an old friend).
Just; Just: I finished my meal (just finished my meal).
Dialect; get along well: Qu is good with his classmates (he gets along well with his classmates). See "Concise Hong Kong Dialect Dictionary".
